languages.text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.
languages.original_text: Жрецы Адептус Механикус посвящают себя Богу-Машине, Омниссии, и Движущей Силе: источнику всех знаний и воплощению мудрости. Прибегая к изощренным ритуалам, механически аугментированные жрецы создают, обслуживают и чинят все устройства, созданные человечеством.

traits.locale_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge and the embodiment of wisdom. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humankind.

The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge and the embodiment of wisdom. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humankind.

The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

languages.text: Жрецы Адептус Механикус посвящают себя Богу-Машине, Омниссии, и Движущей Силе: источнику всех знаний и воплощению мудрости. Прибегая к изощренным ритуалам, механически аугментированные жрецы создают, обслуживают и чинят все устройства, созданные человечеством.

Der Adeptus Mechanicus widmet sich dem Maschinengott, dem Omnissiah und der Antriebskraft: der Quelle allen Wissens, der Verkörperung der Weisheit, und des Animus, der alles befähigt. In aufwändigen Ritualen überwachen die mechanisch augmentierten Priester die Herstellung, Wartung und Reparatur aller von den Menschen hergestellten Geräte.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Der Adeptus Mechanicus widmet sich dem Maschinengott, dem Omnissiah und der Antriebskraft: der Quelle allen Wissens, der Verkörperung der Weisheit, und des Animus, der alles befähigt. In aufwändigen Ritualen überwachen die mechanisch augmentierten Priester die Herstellung, Wartung und Reparatur aller von den Menschen hergestellten Geräte.

languages.text: L'Adeptus Mechanicus se consacre au Dieu-Machine, à l'Omnimessie et à la Force Motrice : la source de toutes les connaissances, l'incarnation de la sagesse et l'énergie vitale. Par le biais de rituels élaborés, des prêtres mécaniquement augmentés supervisent la fabrication, l'entretien et la réparation des dispositifs conçus par l'Humanité.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

traits.locale_text: L'Adeptus Mechanicus se consacre au Dieu-Machine, à l'Omnimessie et à la Force Motrice : la source de toutes les connaissances, l'incarnation de la sagesse et l'énergie vitale. Par le biais de rituels élaborés, des prêtres mécaniquement augmentés supervisent la fabrication, l'entretien et la réparation des dispositifs conçus par l'Humanité.

languages.text: 机械修会崇拜“万机之神”欧姆尼塞亚与源力，认为欧姆尼塞亚是一切知识的源泉与一切智慧的化身。他们认为世上一切能量都来自源力。机械修会的信徒植入了各种各样的机械植入物，会通过精心设计的仪式，监督人类所有机械装置的制造、维护与修理工作。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会崇拜“万机之神”欧姆尼塞亚与原初动力，认为欧姆尼塞亚是一切知识的源泉与一切智慧的化身。他们认为世上一切能量都来自原初动力。机械修会的信徒植入了各种各样的机械植入物，会通过精心设计的仪式，监督人类所有机械装置的制造、维护与修理工作。

languages.text: 帝国技術局は、機械神（マシンゴッド）、万機神、そしてあらゆる知識の源であり、知恵の具現化であり、すべてに力を与えるアニムスである原動力に自らを捧げる。精巧な儀式によって機械的に増強された司祭たちが、人類が製造したあらゆる装置の製造、メンテナンス、修理を監督する。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局は、機械神（マシンゴッド）、万機神、そしてあらゆる知識の源であり、知恵の具現化であり、すべてに力を与えるアニムスである原動力に自らを捧げる。精巧な儀式によって機械的に増強された司祭たちが、人類が製造したあらゆる装置の製造、メンテナンス、修理を監督する。

languages.text: El Adeptus Mechanicus se consagra al Dios Máquina, el Omnissiah, y la Fuerza Motriz. Esta última es la fuente de todo conocimiento, la representación de la sabiduría y el ánima que todo lo fortalece. Por medio de intrincados rituales, los sacerdotes aumentados mecánicamente supervisan la fabricación, el mantenimiento y la reparación de cada aparato producido por la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.

traits.locale_text: El Adeptus Mechanicus se consagra al Dios Máquina, el Omnissiah, y la Fuerza Motriz. Esta última es la fuente de todo conocimiento, la representación de la sabiduría y el ánima que todo lo fortalece. Por medio de intrincados rituales, los sacerdotes aumentados mecánicamente supervisan la fabricación, el mantenimiento y la reparación de cada aparato producido por la Humanidad.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus mensupları kendilerini Makine Tanrı'ya; Hermesih'e ve tüm irfanın kaynağı, bilgeliğin cisme bürünmüş hâli ve herkese güç veren öz olan Devinim Gücü'ne adarlar. Mekanik aksamla kuvvetlendirilmiş rahipler; İnsanlık tarafından üretilen her cihazın imalat, bakım ve onarımına nezaret eden kapsamlı ayinler tertiplerler.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus devote themselves to the Machine God, the Omnissiah, and the Motive Force: the source of all knowledge, the embodiment of wisdom, and the animus that empowers all. With elaborate rituals, mechanically augmented priests oversee the fabrication, maintenance, and repair of every device crafted by Humanity.
